ygData.subject: RE: Stupid Question
ygData.msgSnippet: HRm. That makes sense. I wondered why my dark elf was seeing the air elemental in East Commonlands that other characters have to have see invisible on in order
ygData.messageBody:
HRm. That makes sense. I wondered why my dark elf was seeing the air
elemental in East Commonlands that other characters have to have see
invisible on in order to see..

But this does not explain why Neriak guards don't see through invisibile
when you run through. (Or do they? And I'm just so busy running I don't
notice?)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Ken Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 2:11 PM

>Nobody explicitly said this, but if I'm not mistaken, Ultravision
>also allows you to see through invisibility. I used to sing it to find
